name: Bonds of Steel
description:
Hello friends!

Bonds of Steel is a goofy platformer about 2 unlikely friends combining their abilities to try and escape their dungeon.

It was developed in 48h during the GTMK Jam 2021, under the theme "Joined together".

How to play

A/D - Move

LEFT-MOUSE BUTTON - Pick/Drop your friend

RIGHT-MOUSE BUTTON - Throw your friend in the direction of your cursor

SPACE - Jump, as long as you're not holding your friend
